revision.text: '''Occa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Razz]], at least 1 [[Figy]], at least 1 [[Tamato]] and at least 1 [[Spelon]]. [[Farming Setups]] using Occa can be found [[Farming Setups#Squirtbottle Leveling Strategies|here]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
